name: live_room_bio
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool quality_porn.
Tool description: JSON search API for best free porn videos and pornstars gathered from the most popular porn sites. Filter by terms, quality and specific types and preferences.
Adult, NSFW, Porn, Nudes, Pornstars as JSON
API description: Fetches the biography of a live room from the provided `name` using the RapidAPI service.

name.description: The name of the live room for which to fetch the biography.
